name: Mother's Drum
description: A game created for Global Game Jam 2016 by: Leon Kennedy, John Ortner, Rob Vary, Clark Chambers, Jessica Bailer, Christopher Kerl, and Ryan Kline - MENU - up and down to navigate enter to select - CONTROLS - Z: Left Mallet X: Right Mallet When my people cry out to me, I guide them to my summit with the drum. My heart beat. But the forest is dark and full of terror. Can you guide my people back to me? My Heartbeat Guides them . . .
